content:
@Eric Nienhouse, I've been using intake-esm to work with data on the CMIP-AP. I found the files in the attached file using a source_id="UKESM1-0-LL", institution_id="NIMS-KMA".

Are these files out of place? Should the institution_id (which is part of the path) really be "MOHC"`?

UKESM1-0-LL-but-not-MOHC.csv

Hi Matt, I'll review this. At first pass, this looks to be correct, as some modeling centers run other institution's models for CMIP activities. (I agree, MOHC is the typical institution running UKESM* models).
